<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fighter's Fork](/Equipment.aspx?ID=385)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 600 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 or 2 hands

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_, usually engraved with a decorative pattern resembling fish scales, is a common weapon among warriors of aquatic ancestries.
